description.value: All creatures with the Daemonic Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable do not gain any of the benefits of that trait.

system.benefit: All creatures with the Daemonic Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable do not gain any of the benefits of that trait.

prerequisites.text: Tier 3: Untouchable E.Adv, Warp Anathema, Willpower 55.

specialAbilities.name: Anti-Daemon Aura
specialAbilities.description: All creatures with the Daemonic Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable do not gain any of the benefits of that trait.
